Returns: The large icon for the car notification.
getLargeIcon().Description: Gets the large icon used in this car notification, or null if no icon has been set.

setColor(int).Description: Sets the accent color to use when Android Auto presents the notification. Android Auto uses the color set with @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#setColor_E@ to accent the displayed notification. However, not all colors are acceptable in an automotive setting. This method can be used to override the color provided in the notification in such a situation.

Parameters: Bitmap: The large icon to use in the car notification.
setLargeIcon(android.graphics.Bitmap).Description: Sets the large icon of the car notification. If no large icon is set in the extender, Android Auto will display the icon specified by @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#setLargeIcon_E@

getUnreadConversation().Description: Returns the unread conversation conveyed by this notification.

ClassDesc: Helper class to add Android Auto extensions to notifications. To create a notification with car extensions: Car extensions can be accessed on an existing notification by using the CarExtender(Notification) constructor, and then using the get methods to access values.
